title: Harold Meets Elias (Person of Interest)(2 x 4)
author: Person of Interest Highlights
comment: Elias was used so wisely by the producers. Every POI fan was left hungry for more.
God damn, Elias was so well written and Enrico plays him so darn well. Such a great character
I can't help but like Elias. When I see him and Finch I see two equal intellects jousting. He is so well written and played. He adds tremendously to the plot lines.
All Elias wanted was a worthy chess opponent...... Facts 💯
Elias was one of those likeable characters. He was the bad guy who became a friend.
description:
Harold meets with Elias in an attempt to get his help.

I do not own Person of Interest, all rights go to its creators and distributors.
